TextView.android:text: This prototype application aims to help solve the problem of chronic stress plaguing modern society through the use of wearable technology. It will aid a user in monitoring and managing prolonged levels of high stress.

TextView.android:text: The chosen area of wearable technology to be used are heart rate monitors in order to calculate a person's heart rate variability.
TextView.tools:text: The chosen area of wearable technology to be used are heart rate monitors in order to calculate a person's heart rate variability.
Heart rate variability is a measurement of the variance between each heart beat and can be a great indicator of a user's level of stress.
